problem_statement_suffix:
CRITICAL ENVIRONMENT RESTRICTIONS:
- DO NOT run conda install or install.packages() - ToS and system headers block installation.
- ft2build.h (FreeType) is MISSING - tidyverse cannot be compiled.
- Only use pre-installed R packages.
- Check installed packages: Rscript -e "installed.packages()[,'Package']"
- Use base R alternatives (read.csv, subset, merge, base plotting) if tidyverse unavailable.
- Create output directories: mkdir -p ../results/tables ../results/figures
- For graphics: options(bitmapType='cairo') may help with png output.
